statements: SELECT * FROM workout_leaderboard;
SELECT athlete_id, workout_date, workout_type FROM workout_leaderboard ORDER BY workout_date ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, workout_type, workout_duration_minutes FROM workout_leaderboard WHERE workout_type = 'Cardio';
SELECT athlete_id, workout_type, workout_performance_rating FROM workout_leaderboard WHERE workout_duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT * FROM workout_leaderboard WHERE workout_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT athlete_id, workout_date, workout_type, workout_duration_minutes, workout_performance_rating FROM workout_leaderboard WHERE workout_duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY workout_date DESC
SELECT athlete_id, workout_type, workout_duration_minutes FROM workout_leaderboard WHERE workout_type = 'Cardio' OR workout_type = 'Yoga' ORDER BY athlete_id ASC
SELECT * FROM workout_leaderboard WHERE workout_performance_rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY workout_date, workout_duration_minutes ASC

SELECT athlete_id, workout_type, workout_duration_minutes, workout_performance_rating FROM workout_leaderboard WHERE workout_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY workout_date DESC, workout_duration_minutes DESC
SELECT athlete_id, workout_date, workout_performance_rating FROM workout_leaderboard WHERE workout_duration_minutes < 60 AND workout_performance_rating < 3.5 ORDER BY workout_date ASC
SELECT * FROM athlete WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, name, age FROM athlete WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM athlete WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT athlete_id, name, workout_date, duration_minutes FROM athlete JOIN workout_performance ON athlete.athlete_id = workout_performance.athlete_id;
SELECT MAX(duration_minutes) AS max_duration FROM workout_performance;
SELECT * FROM athlete WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, name, age FROM athlete WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, name, workout_date, duration_minutes FROM workout_performance WHERE distance_km > 10 ORDER BY workout_date DESC;

SELECT athlete.name, workout_performance.duration_minutes, workout_performance.calories_burned FROM athlete INNER JOIN workout_performance ON athlete.athlete_id = workout_performance.athlete_id WHERE athlete.gender = 'Female' AND workout_performance.duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY workout_performance.duration_minutes ASC;

SELECT athlete.name AS athlete_name, SUM(workout_performance.distance_km) AS total_distance FROM athlete INNER JOIN workout_performance ON athlete.athlete_id = workout_performance.athlete_id GROUP BY athlete.name HAVING total_distance > 50 ORDER BY total_distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_gender FROM Athletes ORDER BY athlete_name DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, workout_type FROM WorkoutSessions WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT session_id, steps_taken, distance_miles FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE calories_burned > 500 ORDER BY session_id ASC;
SELECT athlete_name, session_date, workout_type, duration_minutes FROM Athletes JOIN WorkoutSessions ON Athletes.athlete_id = WorkoutSessions.athlete_id;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_gender FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, session_date, workout_type FROM Athletes JOIN WorkoutSessions ON Athletes.athlete_id = WorkoutSessions.athlete_id;

SELECT athlete_name, session_date, steps_taken, calories_burned FROM Athletes JOIN WorkoutSessions ON Athletes.athlete_id = WorkoutSessions.athlete_id JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON WorkoutSessions.session_id = PerformanceMetrics.session_id;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE calories_burned > 500 AND distance_miles < 5 ORDER BY steps_taken DESC;

SELECT athlete_name, session_date, workout_type, duration_minutes, steps_taken, calories_burned, distance_miles FROM Athletes JOIN WorkoutSessions ON Athletes.athlete_id = WorkoutSessions.athlete_id JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON WorkoutSessions.session_id = PerformanceMetrics.session_id ORDER BY session_date DESC, duration_minutes ASC;
SELECT * FROM athletes;
SELECT athlete_id, athlete_name, athlete_age FROM athletes WHERE athlete_country='USA';
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_gender FROM athletes ORDER BY athlete_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM workouts WHERE workout_type='Strength Training';
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_country FROM athletes WHERE athlete_age > 30 ORDER BY athlete_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE athlete_gender = 'Male';
SELECT athlete_id, athlete_name, athlete_country FROM athletes WHERE athlete_age > 25;
SELECT workout_name, workout_type FROM workouts WHERE workout_intensity = 'High';
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_age, athlete_country FROM athletes ORDER BY athlete_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_distance > 500;
SELECT * FROM athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, age FROM athletes WHERE gender='M';
SELECT workout_name, workout_type FROM workouts ORDER BY workout_intensity DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, age, completion_time FROM athletes JOIN performance_metrics ON athletes.athlete_id = performance_metrics.athlete_id WHERE calories_burned > 500;
SELECT athlete_name, total_points FROM athletes JOIN ranks ON athletes.athlete_id = ranks.athlete_id ORDER BY total_points DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM athletes ORDER BY athlete_id DESC, athlete_name ASC;
SELECT athlete_name, age FROM athletes WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, workout_name, completion_time FROM athletes INNER JOIN performance_metrics ON athletes.athlete_id = performance_metrics.athlete_id ORDER BY completion_time ASC;
SELECT athlete_name, total_points FROM athletes INNER JOIN ranks ON athletes.athlete_id = ranks.athlete_id WHERE total_points > 100 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT workout_name, workout_intensity, calories_burned FROM workouts WHERE workout_type = 'Cardio' AND workout_intensity >= 7 ORDER BY calories_burned DESC;
